item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Add datasource # We can add Prometheus, VictoriaMetrics, Thanos, ElasticSearch, Loki, etc. as data sources. Query metrics # Go to the exploration page to query metrics. If data can be queried, it indicates that the data source configuration is correct. Add alerting rules # Want to add alerting rules? Go to the alerting page to add alerting rules. Query events # If everything is normal, an alarm event will be generated shortly.
